title: Person of Interest - How Reese and Shaw greet each other
author: TheBlackCube17
comment: Imagine both of them have a child. That child will be powerful af.

Reese,and Shaw started out as rivals.Now Reese,and Shaw have a mutual respect for each other.This video does a fine job of bringing that fact out. Reese,and Shaw know what each other is capable of,and minimal communication is all that is needed.I would not want these two to get mad at me !
description: How Finch's two bad ass enforcers make small talk.
